## BlockPolledMosaicStore class

Ethers-based [MosaicStore](./lib-base.mosaicstore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledMosaicStore extends MosaicStore<BlockPolledMosaicStoreExtraState> 
```
